subject: PE Today: Harry Smith Spars With Tony Snow
body:
CBSNews.com












Smith Vs. SnowWhenever "Early Show" 
      anchor Harry Smith interviews White House press secretary Tony Snow, 
      there's a good chance for fireworks.
This morning we got another battle between the two, with Snow 
      telling Smith "No, Harry. You can't have your own 
      facts."  We spoke with Harry Smith about Tony Snow and how 
      he approaches converstations with the White House messenger.[+ Read More]

Pinning 
      Down Poll NumbersA new Los Angeles Times/Bloomberg 
      poll today suggests that just 27 percent of Americans approve of the way Congress is doing its job. But with a poll yesterday showing less than half 
      of Americans can identify Nancy Pelosi as Speaker of the House, what, if 
      anything, can the public get from these numbers? We spoke with the 
      CBS News Director of Surveys to make sense of these 
      findings.[+ Read More]

A Model Walks Into a News Studio 
      ...In Texas, a CBS 
      affiliate now has a swimsuit model filming an upcoming reality 
      show covering a celebrity 
      largely famous for a sex tape on a news program on which Stormy The Dog covers the weather.  Is this another example of the news 
      industry falling apart, or the ultimate sign that people should just tune 
      out their local newscasts altogether?[+ Read More]
